name: Koch Companies Public Sector, LLC
legal: Delaware limited liability company, United States of America
bossPosition: President & COO, Government and Public Affairs
goal: Koch Companies Public Sector, LLC seeks to ensure that the Koch Companies have the best possible public sector environment in which to freely practice Principled Entrepreneurship(TM) by systematically applying Market-Based Management(TM).
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: All initiatives in the areas of environmental protection, trade, financial and monetary union, energy and internal market, such as the recast of the fertilizer regulation, REACH, EU's free trade agreement negotiations, Brexit negotiations and tax transparency discussions/legislation and connected automated driving.
